sentences.en: And outraged, nauseous, flabbergasted ... I wish I could say I can't imagine what they were thinking, but in fact I do have a guess.
sentences.cn: 我感到受了伤害，并且愤怒、恶心、震惊······ 我但愿自己能说无法想像出他们的想法，但事实上我有一个猜想。

sentences.en: Every few months, I receive an e-mail from an outraged (usually white) reader who is dismayed by what she sees as the denigration of my work.
sentences.cn: 每隔几个月，我便会收到一封来自愤怒读者（通常是白人）的电子邮件，对于她认为我的作品遭到的诋毁感到愤忾。

sentences.en: Greeks have turned out in droves to a series of nationwide protests against the economy and austerity measures, outraged that they are being asked to make more sacrifices.
sentences.cn: 希腊人举行了一系列针对经济状况和紧缩措施的大规模抗议，他们对政府要求自己做出更多牺牲感到愤怒。
他发出一声愤怒的尖叫。

sentences.en: He is truly outraged about what's happened to him.
sentences.cn: 这一遭遇实在让他满腔愤慨。

sentences.en: He was outraged by their behavior.
sentences.cn: 他们的行为使他感到愤慨.

sentences.en: I was absolutely outraged that I could be even mentioned in an article of this kind.
sentences.cn: 我大为恼火，我的名字居然出现在这种文章里面。

sentences.en: It outraged the public that the local authority decided to close the road.
sentences.cn: 当局决定封闭该路引起了公愤。

sentences.en: Many people have been outraged by some of the things that have been said.
sentences.cn: 其中的一些言论激怒了很多人。

sentences.en: One might be outraged by his callous selfisness.
sentences.cn: 他的冷酷,自私能叫人气得火冒三丈.

sentences.en: She had been stunned , then outraged, then crushed.
sentences.cn: 她起先发楞, 然后气恼,最后认输.

sentences.en: Some outraged readers said the story was extremely offensive and distressing.
sentences.cn: 一些感到义愤的读者说这篇报道极为令人反感，而且非常伤人。

sentences.en: The closing of the school has outraged public opinion.
sentences.cn: 关闭这所学校触犯了民意.

sentences.en: The public were outraged by the decision.
sentences.cn: 公众对这一决定非常愤怒.

sentences.en: The speaker's remarks outraged the audience.
sentences.cn: 讲演者的话引起了听众的愤怒.

sentences.en: They were outraged by our incursion into Cambodia.
sentences.cn: 他们对我们入侵柬埔寨感到愤慨.

sentences.en: When he repeated to me the sordid little scene I was outraged.
sentences.cn: 当他对我回述这幕令人作呕的丑戏时,我真是气坏了.

words.tran_cn: 凌辱，强奸；对…施暴行；激起愤怒

trans.tran_cn: 引起…的义愤，激怒( outrage的过去式和过去分词 )
